lead_paragraph: LONDON, Jan. 31 -- General Henri Honore Giraud in a telegram to President Roosevelt today expressed the gratitude which he said Overseas France felt for "the decisive help of the United States." France now, he said, "can accomplish the mission that is hers and free Metropolitan France."
abstract: French pol: Giraud message to Roosevelt thanks latter for US role
